summary: An AI application called 'Axora AI' with a dark/black theme that displays videos and pictures, solves math problems from kindergarten to college level, includes a sidebar showing previous chat history, allows users to request AI-generated images and videos by describing what they want, and features a translator chat box for translating different languages
architectural_notes: AI-powered application with multi-modal content display
Educational focus with adaptive math difficulty levels
Dark theme UI with black background
Math solver extended to support college-level operations beyond K-12
Multi-language translation feature via dedicated chat box interface
Teacher Mode feature in math solver provides pedagogical explanations alongside solutions

existing_features.title: Create a media display component that can show videos and pictures uploaded by users or provided by the system
Implement a math problem solver that accepts user input and solves math questions ranging from kindergarten level through 12th grade difficulty
Create a persistent sidebar component that displays previous chat conversations with the AI, allowing users to view and access their chat history
Brand the application as 'Hollow AI' throughout the interface including the title, headers, and any branding elements

Design a cohesive visual theme for Hollow AI with a modern, educational aesthetic that feels approachable for students from kindergarten through 12th grade, using warm and inviting colors with clear typography and intuitive layouts that guide users through math problems and media content naturally
Change the application theme from white/light to black/dark throughout the entire interface, including backgrounds, cards, and all UI elements

In the MediaDisplay component where it says 'videos and images', add an input field that allows users to describe the image they want the AI to create, then generate that image based on their text description

In the MediaDisplay component where it says 'videos', add an input field that allows users to describe the video they want the AI to create with motion and movement, then generate that animated video based on their text description

Extend the MathProblemSolver component to evaluate and solve advanced mathematical operations including exponents (e.g., 10^10), square roots, cube roots, nth roots, logarithms (log, ln), trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan, etc.), and complex multi-operation expressions

Update the math expression parser to support advanced mathematical notation including power/exponent symbols (^), root functions (sqrt, cbrt), logarithmic functions (log, ln), and trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan, asin, acos, atan, sinh, cosh, tanh)

Extend the step-by-step solution generator in MathProblemSolver to provide educational explanations for advanced operations including how exponents work, properties of logarithms, trigonometric identities, and root simplification
Create a new TranslatorChat component that provides a chat interface specifically for translating text between different languages
Add language selection inputs in the TranslatorChat component allowing users to choose source and target languages for translation
Implement translation logic in the TranslatorChat component that takes user input text and displays the translated output in the target language
Add the TranslatorChat component as a new tab or section in the main application interface alongside the existing math solver, media display, and chat features
Update the application title in frontend/index.html from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'
Update the Header component logo text from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'
Replace any remaining references to 'Hollow AI' with 'Axora AI' throughout the frontend interface including comments and accessibility labels
Replace the current Axora AI logo in the Header component with the user-provided logo image (Gemini_Generated_Image_hpg3d6hpg3d6hpg3.png)
Ensure the logo image is optimized for display with proper dimensions and is visible against the dark background theme
Add a 'Teacher Mode' toggle control in the MathProblemSolver component that users can enable or disable
When Teacher Mode is enabled, enhance the step-by-step solution explanations to use clear, pedagogical language that explains mathematical concepts in an accessible way suitable for students

In Teacher Mode, provide contextual explanations for mathematical concepts encountered in the problem, such as defining what an exponent means, explaining the purpose of logarithms, or describing trigonometric relationships

AI image generation based on user text descriptions

Enhance math solver to handle advanced operations: exponents (10^10), roots, logarithms, trigonometry, and complex expressions

Update Axora AI logo to user-provided image
